entry.title: Salted Caramel Bone Broth Protein Powder
entry.summary:
Vendor: DISK
Type: Nutrition Drinks & Shakes
Price: 49.00

Salted Caramel Bone Broth Protein Powder

Discover the ultimate in wellness with our Bone Broth Protein Powder, a nutrient-dense supplement designed to support your health and fitness goals. Packed with grass-fed collagen, essential amino acids, vitamins, and minerals, this premium protein powder promotes joint health, gut integrity, and muscle recovery. Each serving delivers a rich source of protein while being low in carbs and sugar-free, making it a perfect addition to any low-carb or ketogenic diet. Our bone broth protein is crafted from high-quality, non-GMO, and gluten-free ingredients, ensuring a clean and pure supplement. Easily mix it into your favorite smoothies or shakes for a convenient, instant boost of protein and nutrients. Try it today and support your body’s health from the inside out!

Bone Broth Protein. All Health. No additives.

  • 0 grams of sugar
  • No artificial sweeteners
  • No artificial ingredients
  • 5 grams of total carbohydrates
  • 2 grams of net carbs
  • 1 gram of total fat
  • 21 grams of grass-fed protein
  • Dairy-free
  • Soy-free
  • Gluten-free
  • Grain-free
  • Non-GMO
  • Paleo-friendly
  • Keto-friendly 

What Are the Benefits of Protein Powder?

Protein helps support muscle strength and build muscle mass. 

Getting enough protein to meet our recommended daily values may be difficult, especially if your goal is to build muscle. Supplementing with protein powders can help add more protein to your diet and may also help you feel fuller for longer, which may help you lose weight.

With its high nutrition profile of essential amino acids, vitamins, and minerals, not to mention compounds like hyaluronic acid, glutamine, glycine, chondroitin, and glucosamine, bone broth protein powder has some great health benefits. 

These compounds may help support the metabolism, encourage steady energy levels, support muscle tissue, support growth hormone production, and support your immune system function.

The collagen protein and gelatin found in bone broth can help support the GI tract and may help support your gut microbiome. Optimal gut health may even influence your moods — so don’t underestimate the benefits of this powerful protein.

This superfood may also support your body’s natural collagen production. This can, in turn, support bone mineral density and dental health, as well as younger-looking skin, hair, and nails.

Is Bone Broth Protein Powder as Good as Bone Broth?

Absolutely! Bone broth protein powder is essentially dehydrated bone broth. The water is gone, but all the nourishing ingredients remain. 

Think of our bone broth powder as a convenient way to get the benefits of bone broth when and wherever you need it. You can take it on the go and add it to your food and beverages. Or, you can bring it with you to the gym and add it to your favorite post-workout protein shake. The options are endless!

Use on the Bone Broth Diet

Use this product on our my Bone Broth Diet by putting it in post-workout smoothies, your morning cup of coffee, or any other recipes that need a boost of flavor. If you’re following ourmy 10 Day Belly Slimdown you can use this bone broth protein in your daily shake to have a sweet drink that feels like it’s melting the fat away.

Reached your goal weight and now on our my 80/20 Maintenance Plan? Use our my Salted Caramel bone broth protein to replace a meal each day with a creamy, Salted Caramel shake. It can will help reduce your calories and curb any sugar cravings.

All of my our high-quality Bone Broth Proteins are made from beef bones of grass-fed cows and contain no GMOs, hormones, or antibiotics.

Increase Your Collagen

Supporting your natural collagen can help you maintain strength and elasticity in your skin, cells, and soft tissues. Specifically, collagen type II helps form connective tissue, retain moisture, and support nail and hair growth. Added collagen translates into fewer wrinkles, and a stronger body that makes you look and feel younger!

How Can You Use Bone Broth Protein Powder?

Unflavored bone broth powder is an excellent addition to savory dishes like soups, stews, and burger patties. Salted Caramel protein powder may be better suited for sweet dishes. 

With its versatility, you can easily incorporate a serving size of our Salted Caramel Bone Broth Protein Powder into your:

  • Shakes or smoothies
  • Homemade coffee or tea lattes
  • Golden turmeric milk
  • Homemade ice cream
  • Pancake or waffle batter
  • Homemade baked goods

Use our bone broth to improve the flavor and nutrition of your homemade treats, and feel good about eating them. 

Manufactured in a facility that processes milk, soy, egg, wheat, peanuts, and tree nuts. 

California Prop 65 Warning

 WARNING: Consuming the bone broth in this product can expose you to chemicals including lead which is known to the State of California to cause cancer and birth defects or other reproductive harm. For more information go to p65warnings.ca.gov/products/food.

✝These statements have not been evaluated by the Food and Drug Administration. This product is not intended to diagnose, treat, cure, or prevent any disease.

entry.title: Chocolate Bone Broth Protein Powder
entry.summary:
Vendor: Dr. Kellyann
Type: Nutrition Drinks & Shakes
Price: 49.00

Bone Broth Protein

Discover the ultimate in wellness with our Bone Broth Protein Powder, a nutrient-dense supplement designed to support your health and fitness goals. Packed with grass-fed collagen, essential amino acids, vitamins, and minerals, this premium protein powder promotes joint health, gut integrity, and muscle recovery. Each serving delivers a rich source of protein while being low in carbs, making it a perfect addition to any low-carb or ketogenic diet. Our bone broth protein is crafted from high-quality, non-GMO, and gluten-free ingredients, ensuring a clean and pure supplement. Easily mix it into your favorite smoothies or shakes for a convenient, instant boost of protein and nutrients. Try it today and support your body’s health from the inside out!

Bone Broth Protein. Pure Health. No additives.

  • No artificial sweeteners
  • 2 grams of net carbs
  • 21 grams of grass-fed protein
  • Dairy-free
  • Soy-free
  • Gluten-free
  • Grain-free
  • Non-GMO
  • Paleo-friendly
  • Keto-friendly

Perfect Supplement to the Bone Broth Diet

Use this product on our Bone Broth Diet by putting it in your smoothies, your morning coffee, or any other recipe that requires a boost of protein. If you’re on our 10-Day Belly Slimdown use this delicious bone broth protein in your daily shake to have a cool, sweet drink that practically melts the fat away.

If you’ve reached your goal weight and are now on our 80/20 Maintenance Plan you can replace one meal per day with a delicious chocolate shake to reduce your calories and curb sugar cravings.

Organic, grass-fed bone broth

Our Bone Broth Protein is made from real, grass-fed protein and contains no GMOs, no hormones, and no antibiotics. Simply put, it’s real beef processed in the right way to preserve all nutritional value.

Added Collagen

Supplementing your diet with our Bone Broth Protein Powder also supplies your body with collagen so your skin, cells, and soft tissues can maintain their strength and elasticity. This extra collagen help minimize the appearance of wrinkles and help you look and feel younger, even as you age!

Manufactured in a facility that processes milk, soy, egg, wheat, peanuts, and tree nuts.

What Is Bone Broth Protein?

Most protein powder is made from eggs, whey, or legumes — but what if you could add the ancient nutrition of Dr. Kellyann’s organic bone broth to all of your favorite recipes? With Dr. Kellyann’s keto and paleo-friendly, grass-fed bone broth protein powder, you can.

Bone broth protein powder contains all of the proteins, vitamins, minerals, and amino acids of bone broth. That means you’ll get all of the collagen, all of the glycine, and all of the protein.

This superfood is made by dehydrating beef bone broth into a concentrated powder. Dr. Kellyann’s pure beef protein is derived using her proprietary hydrolyzing process, making it easy for our bodies to digest. Easier digestion can support nutrient absorption, meaning that you can get more protein from your shake.

What Are the Health Benefits of Bone Broth Protein?

Dr. Kellyann’s Chocolate Bone Broth Protein Powder is generally easily digestible and full of nutrients that can support joint, skin, bone, and gut health. These nutrients can also support the immune system and may help support restful sleep.

There are 21 grams of grass-fed protein in one serving size of Dr. Kellyann’s chocolate protein powder, helping to keep you feeling full in between meals. The protein does the hard work for you by fueling your body for longer, helping to reduce cravings and support weight loss.

Our protein formula is low in calories, contains zero artificial ingredients, and is free of dairy, soy, and gluten. Plus, it’s free from binding ingredients like xanthan gum and guar gum. The result? A delicious protein powder that only contains one percent of your daily value of carbohydrates.

Dr. Kellyann’s bone broth protein powder contains hyaluronic acid,  amino acids, like glucosamine and glycine, and chondroitin. Glucosamine and chondroitin work to support gut health and encourage smooth digestion. Meanwhile, hyaluronic acid can help support your joint health and digestive system.

Amino acids are said to be the “building blocks” of proteins in our bodies, so it’s important that we eat foods rich in these acids to support our bodies’ natural protein production. Amino acids glutamine and glucosamine can help break down fats in our digestive system, as well as support the gut microbiome and immune system function.

Additionally, collagen proteins can help support skin elasticity for younger and brighter-looking skin. Our bodies produce collagen proteins naturally, but as we age, that process begins to decline. When that happens, you may start to notice fine lines, wrinkles, and sagging skin.

Dr. Kellyann recommends eating foods or taking a supplement that contains 15 to 30 grams of collagen protein every day. By adding collagen to your diet, you may be able to brighten the tone and smoothen the texture of your skin. 

How Can You Use Bone Broth Protein Powder?

Dr. Kellyann’s chocolate protein powder pairs perfectly with almond or coconut milk and can be used to make smoothies, desserts, and other chocolate-flavored beverages. For instance, simply mix together some unflavored, unsweetened almond milk, Dr. Kellyann’s Chocolate Bone Broth Protein, a frozen banana, and some almond butter for a nourishing, gut-friendly shake with a great taste.

Our formula uses cocoa powder for a natural chocolate flavor and is sweetened with antioxidant-rich monk fruit extract rather than stevia. Each serving only has two net carbs, which can help you cut down on total carbohydrates.

Check out this dietary supplement if you are struggling to lose weight or want to support your digestion and skin health. You can use this chocolate protein powder in combination with many of Dr. Kellyann’s weight loss programs, including the bone broth diet.

Manufactured in a facility that processes milk, soy, egg, wheat, peanuts, and tree nuts.

California Prop 65 Warning

 WARNING: Consuming the bone broth in this product can expose you to chemicals including lead which is known to the State of California to cause cancer and birth defects or other reproductive harm. For more information go to p65warnings.ca.gov/products/food.

✝These statements have not been evaluated by the Food and Drug Administration. This product is not intended to diagnose, treat, cure, or prevent any disease.
